mapper.select: select wpId,w.productId,currentCnt,lockCnt,w.modifiedTime, p.productCore,p.productName from warehouse_product w left join product_info p on w.productId = p.productId order by wpId

select wpId,w.productId,currentCnt,lockCnt,w.modifiedTime, p.productCore,p.productName from warehouse_product w left join product_info p on w.productId = p.productId
and productName like concat('%',#{productName},'%')
and productCore like concat('%',#{productCore},'%')
order by orderId
